articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Who is Denmark's Crown Prince Frederik? The Successor set to ascend throne after Queen Margrethe II | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Queen Margrethe II of Denmark, Europe's longest-serving monarch, will abdicate on January 14, after a 52-year reign. The throne will be inherited by her eldest son, Crown Prince Frederik.
articles.content: After an impressive 52-year reign, Queen Margrethe II of Denmark, recognized as Europe's longest-serving monarch, declared her intention to abdicate on January 14. The throne will be inherited by her… [+3233 chars]
